DOC.brief_summary: To compare bioequivalence Perrigo 's azelaic acid foam product Finacea Foam treatment Inflammatory Lesions Rosacea
DOC.brief_title: Bioequivalence Study Two Treatments Treatment Inflammatory Lesions Rosacea Face
